hint: Pictograph of a person standing up (𡈼) and gazing at the moon (月). 亡 is a sound component.
shuowen: 《說文》：“望，出亡在外，望其還也。从亡，朢省聲。”

comments.text: 徐灝注箋：“竊謂望、朢實本一字。《玉篇》有𡔞字，蓋即古瞻望之望，从𡈼，亡聲。𡈼者，跂而望之之義也。”

components.hint: Depicts the tip of a knife.

images.description: 杞伯每亡簋(金)春秋早期

chars.hint: Depicts the tip of a knife blade (刀). Similar in origin to 方. Based on the original meaning "tip of a blade", now written as 芒. The current meaning is a phonetic loan.

comments.text: 段玉裁注：“會意，謂入於𨒅曲隱蔽之處也。”朱駿聲通訓定聲：“會意。𠃊者，隱也。”

topWords.gloss: the name remains, but the reality is gone (idiom)

images.description: 二祀弋其卣(金)商代晚期

comments.text: 徐灝注箋：“古文、鐘鼎文象上下弦之形，日象圜形，故月象其闕也。小篆相承取字形茂美耳。”

chars.shuowen: 《說文》：“，善也。从人士；士，事也。一曰象物出地挺生也。”

components.hint: 亻 is a component form of 人.

chars.hint: Pictograph of a person (亻) standing upright on the ground (土).

topWords.gloss: the name remains, but the reality is gone (idiom)
the name remains, but the reality is gone (idiom)
